!post_content: The Portside is located in the heart of Gastown in a totally renovated location that blends the building and neighbourhood's history with modern styling and comfort. Think exposed brick and heritage wood beams with state of the art lights and sound system. We primarily serve craft beer with 20 taps. We are hoping to be the friendliest bar in Vancouver with a nod to maritime pub culture. We will be hosting live music on Sunday - Thursday nights, not specific to any particular genre. Source:
